title: RNA-RNA interactome data analysis
questions: What are the difficulties in mapping chimeric reads from RNA interactome data?
How multi mapping is a big problem in these datasets?
How to filter for meaningful results from large analysis output files?
key_points: Choosing the correct alignment parameters is one of the imporatant factor in the analysis.
For poorly annotated organisms use reference genome instead of trascriptome.

workflows.name: RNA-RNA interactome data analysis - chira  v1.4.3
workflows.title: RNA-RNA interactome data analysis - chira  v1.4.3
